name: Work & Relaxation
description:
This game was developed as part of the "One Game per Week" seminar at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences in Hamburg. In this seminar we design a small game with a new theme every week.

The theme for this week was: "Destroy"

Game Description:

Sometimes you need to work. 
Sometimes you only want to relax a bit.
But sometimes choosing between working and relaxing can be difficult. 

This game will make you regret whatever you choose. (:

Key Features:

  • Work
  • Relaxation
  • 8 Unique Endings!
  • Hope 
  • Destruction of your expectations for the future

Credits:

Denschstar

University of Applied Sciences Europe

Dieses Spiel wurde  an der University of Applied Sciences Europe produziert.

Supervised by: Lena Falkenhagen

"One Game Per Week"  (Sommersemester 2021)
